english.segment1: This is how we know. This is how we know what love is. Just one look at Your cross. And this is where we see. This is where we see how love works. For You surrendered Your all
english.segment2: And this is how we know. That You have loved us first. This is where we chose. To love You in return
english.segment3: For You so loved the world. That You gave Your only Son. Love amazing, so divine. We will love You in return. For this life that You give. For this death that You have died. Love amazing, so divine. We will love You in reply, Lord
